name: Orc
description: Orcs are savage raiders and pillagers with stooped postures, low foreheads, and piggish faces with prominent lower canines that resemble tusks. They revel in combat and bloodshed.

name: Dragon
description: Ancient and powerful, dragons are among the most iconic creatures of fantasy. They can breathe fire, fly, and have massive physical and magical power.

actions.name: Breath Weapon
actions.description: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (9d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
